name: tempCFO Solutions
tag_list: accounting, finance, tax, outsource, interim-cfo, funding, chief-financial-officer
overview:
Outsource Accounting, Financial and Tax Solutions for small and medium sized businesses. Our U.S. based team approach with accountant, controller, CFO and Tax professionals perform the essential accounting and tax functions for a company.

TempCFO Solutions, Inc., was founded in 1999 by principals with Big Four accounting firm experience to provide fully outsourced accounting solutions. From inception we have specialized in meeting the needs of small and medium size businesses (SMBs), including start-up, emerging high-growth, and established companies. By leveraging our infrastructure and experience, our clients can have the following, often at savings of 50% or more compared to creating and maintaining the capabilities in house:

* full-function accounting departments,
* the expertise needed for complex financial transactions, and
* the insight to maximize financial opportunities

TempCFO provides its clients with peace-of-mind that their financial reporting is accurate and timely. We also help our clients create financial opportunity with services that range from optimizing cash management to mergers and acquisitions or transitioning from a privately held to a public company.

CFO Solutions TempCFO Solutions relieves upper management of time-consuming financial and accounting responsibilities, enabling your company’s leaders to concentrate on core competencies. We provide expertise and experience for each step you need to take.

Outsourced Accounting Solutions TempCFO Solutions enables management to focus on its core competencies, instead of building an accounting department. Outsourcing can provide the capabilities of a full-featured accounting department at a fraction of the cost of an in-house solution.

Tax Solutions TempCFO Solutions provides full tax preparation and planning services to its client companies and their principals. Our accounting infrastructure and technology make collecting needed data and making timely filings less burdensome on you and your staff and increases accuracy to a high level with no extra effort on your part.

U.S. based Experts and Staff All TempCFO staff reside in the United States and each has detailed knowledge of the US Internal Revenue Code and state regulations. Our tax accountants are experienced in many different federal and state taxing jurisdictions.

Our Team Approach sets us Apart We assign a team to each company, giving clients the equivalent in continuity and comfort that an in-house tax department would provide. Each company has a dedicated, experienced staff performing its essential accounting and tax functions.
